video.title: Fugitivos
video.synopsis: Julián and Esperanza, both unjustly imprisoned, form a passionate bond behind bars and conceive a daring scheme to prove their innocence.

episodes.synopsis: Camila calls Julián when she discovers money’s been embezzled at Hidrósferas. When he arrives, he finds her dead, as her killer, Cicatriz, escapes.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Julián and Esperanza plan an escape from La Bendita. Sierra realizes Esperanza and Julián had a conjugal visit and gets upset. Sierra hits Julián.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Sierra takes Esperanza to a secluded area and tries to rape her, but Rita shows up to take her to the director. Julián is worried about Esperanza.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Julián sets off a car alarm. Esperanza hopes Julián is OK and gives him her daughter’s diary, which says her father was killed for defending her.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Julián tries to understand what it was she stole from Houston. Houston goes back to Micaela’s and leaves with some photos, including one of Guajira.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Houston plans to pass himself off as a member of an NGO to win Micaela’s mother’s trust. Houston orders the calls to the DEA intercepted.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Julián doesn’t dare tell Esperanza about Micaela. Julián and Micaela decide to leave quickly. Cabeto offers to show them where they can catch a bus.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Sierra rapes Esperanza. Ana plays dumb. Julián manages to get a hand loose. No one can find Micaela. Sierra gives Ana more money to make up her mind.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza arrives at the hospital almost lifeless, but they save her. Rita tells Maribel that Esperanza has been taken to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Cicatriz gets into Patricia’s hotel room and finds out that Julián is in Calarcá. Julián asks Micaela for the satchel, and she says it’s Houston’s.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza returns to prison accompanied by Houston. She receives the package from Julián and finds a paper frog like the ones she taught him to make.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Julián drinks himself into a stupor knowing he’ll never get Samuel back. Patricia calls Julián from a pay phone. Micaela answers the call.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Houston gives Esperanza a cell phone to talk with Micaela. At the DEA, Houston traces the call and determines the area where they’re located.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Cabeto and Julián look for Micaela in the river and find her body floating. They give her artificial respiration and manage to bring her around.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza asks Mariana for information on Julián. Mariana says Patricia found out that Camila’s killer and the witness have family in Santander.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo makes Lorena a business proposal. Though she knows it’s somewhat illegal, she agrees to work with him as long as the profits are split 50-50.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Houston loses patience with the psychologist and shows his more psychopathic side, pulling his gun and threatening him. He’s taken to an asylum.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Julián, Esperanza and Cabeto head to Barichara. Micaela wakes up at Elena’s house, a homeopathic doctor who found her and has been taking care of her.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza sends a coded message by radio to Micaela. Esperanza says she saw Mariana with a man. Julián shows her a photo to confirm it’s Ricardo.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza finds Micaela and hides her as the police are in the area looking for her. Esperanza asks Elena not to turn her daughter in.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza gets a call from Houston telling her he’s with her daughter. Micaela comes running to the house to tell Julián the police are after them.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Elena shows Julián how to reach Guane. Elena sees Micaela leaving with a man pointing a gun at her, and fires her shotgun. Houston manages to dodge.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Houston gags Micaela and Elena and opens for the police. Plummer arrives on the scene and ballistics reveals Johnny was killed with his own gun.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Houston is the real killer of the DEA agent. Plummer promises to rescue Esperanza and her daughter in exchange for the video evidence.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Houston’s last call was to Damasco, a forger. Ricardo puts a laxative in Mariana’s coffee to keep her at home and meet with Irina on his own.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Esperanza refuses to go with Julián for her daughter’s sake. Julián leaves a letter. He manages to reach Zapatoca. Ramírez knows Julián’s been framed.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Julián escapes for Bogotá. Esperanza catches Micaela as she’s about to fall to her death. They bury the hatchet and go to Guane. Micaela is drugged.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Julián escapes for Bogotá. Esperanza catches Micaela as she’s about to fall to her death. They bury the hatchet and go to Guane. Micaela is drugged.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Lieutenant Morales holds Julián at gunpoint. He finds an opportunity to flee, but Morales shoots him in the shoulder. The police lose track of him.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Cicatriz unmasks Ricardo to Julián. He refuses to believe it, so Cicatriz plays a recording: “If I could get rid of Julián, I can get rid of you too.”
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Caviedes almost catches Julián. Caviedes goes to the supermarket to buy some groceries, and Julián takes advantage to get out of the trunk of the car.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Cabeto gives Micaela his phone. Esperanza hears Maribel is free. The police come to Julián, Mariana and the boy’s location. Ricardo visits Mariana.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Mariana talks with Samuel to make sure Ricardo doesn’t know they’re on Julián’s side. The boy hides the sedatives when Mariana pretends to take them.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo gathers any evidence that might incriminate him, but he can’t find Patricia’s cell phone. Torres is following him, waiting outside his house.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Julián asks Torres about Irina and Julián tells her Ricardo is going to try to kill her. Irina manages to escape from the hospital dressed as a nurse.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo buries Irina’s body. Houston talks on the phone with an agent helping him organize his escape. Esperanza finds out Micaela lied to her.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Houston kills himself in front of Esperanza, leaving her in shock. Micaela goes to Cabeto, but he rejects her. Micaela apologizes to her mother.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo fires at Julián, but Esperanza takes the bullet for him. Julián turns himself in. Torres sees the video showing Julián didn’t kill Camila.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: The hit men hold Julián in his neighborhood and wait for Ricardo, who wants to kill him. Micaela undergoes a surgery to save her mother’s life.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo confesses all of the horrible things he’s done to destabilize Julián. He manages to keep it together and hands himself in to be taken to jail.
episodes.title: Episode 40
